warnings: Warnings For external use only. Flammable. Keep away from heat or flame. Do not use in the eyes. In case of contact, rinse eyes thoroughly with water. Stop use and ask a doctor if irritation and redness develop and persist for more than 72 hours. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
dosage_administration: Directions •Wet hands. •Briskly rub hands together until dry. •Supervise children in the use of this product.
indications: Use Hand Sanitizer to help reduce bacteria that potentially can cause disease. For use when soap and water are not available.
